business_details.Business: On perusal of the case diary, it appears that there is incriminating material found against the accused persons. the investigation is still going on . considering the above, the bail prayer of above two accused is rejected at this stage.
The accused both are produced from jail.No report from the I/O received. Seen the bail petition . Heard both side .call for a progress report from the I/O.
Accused are produced from custody. sent back to custody.both the accused person are allowed to go on bail. for  Rs.20000 each. with a surety.
Accused all are absent with step.issue summon to accused persons
Accused Shah alom,taslim,rahimuddin,amejuddin presentAccused Alekjan and renu absent.issue summon

The accused shah alom, Taslim ali, Rahimuddin, and amejuddin is present the accused alekjan nesa present with a bail petition no. 1212/19 praying for go on bail.i have heard ld counsel for the accused and Ld PP .it is stated that the accused is a housewife and residing in her house and she will appear regularly in the court.Considering the ground the accused Alekjan Nesa is allowed to go on bail for Rs. 20,000/- with a surety like amountThe accused Miss Renu Begum absent Summon is not returnedissue fresh summon
Accused all are present except Alek jan Nessa and Renu begum. Alek Jan Nessa is absent with step but Renu Begum is absent without any step. Issue N.B.W against Renu Begum.
Accused all present except renu begum. issue warrent against Renu

This Court is designated as Special Court vide Honourable Gauhati High Court, Guwahati notification dated 02-01-2020.C/R is received on transfer for disposal.Accused Shah Alom Ali Khan, Rahimuddin are present.Seen petition No. 296/2020 filed by ld. Counsel for the accused Alekjan Nessa, Tashlim Ali Khan and Amejuddin praying for time for their appearance.Perused C/R.Heard. Prayer is allowed on the cause shown.W/A against accused Renu Begum returned unexecuted.Accused Shah Alom Ali Khan submits that accused Renu Begum has since expired. Ld. Counsel for the accused is to produced the death certificate of accused Renu Begum on the next date fixed.In the mean time call for a report for the concerned P.S. as to the status of accused Renu Begum whether she is alive or dead.Issue requisition accordingly.In the mean time copy be prepared.Fixing 25-02-2020 for appearance/copy/report.

C/R put up before me as Honourable P.O. is on C.L.Accused Shah Alom Ali Khan, Rahimmuddin Ali Khan and Amejuddin are present.Co-accused Tashlim Ali Khan and Alekjan Nessa are absent with steps vide petition no. 363/2020 showing cause of their illness which is .............................The engaged counsel of the accused had produced the original death certificate of accused Renu Begum bearing Sl. No. 0071711 issued by the Registar Birth and Death Nimua P.H.C.Tag a photocopy of the death certificate with the C/R.Status report called from the concerned P.S. in connection with accused Renu Begum is not yet returned.Issue reminder to O/C of the concerned P.S. to submit report positively on the next date fixed.Inform accordingly.
